Class.Name: NSTextField
Class.Description: Text the user can select or edit to send an action message to a target when the user presses the Return key.

InstanceMethods.Name: selectText:
InstanceMethods.Description: Ends editing in the text field and, if it’s selectable, selects the entire text content.

InstanceMethods.Name: setTitleWithMnemonic:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the text field’s string value using the embedded character as the keyboard mnemonic.

InstanceMethods.Name: textShouldBeginEditing:
InstanceMethods.Description: Requests permission to begin editing a text object.

InstanceMethods.Name: textDidBeginEditing:
InstanceMethods.Description: Posts a notification to the default notification center that the text is about to go into edit mode.

InstanceMethods.Name: textDidChange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Posts a notification when the text changes, and forwards the message to the text field’s cell if it responds.

InstanceMethods.Name: textShouldEndEditing:
InstanceMethods.Description: Performs validation on the text field’s new value.

InstanceMethods.Name: textDidEndEditing:
InstanceMethods.Description: Posts a notification when the text is no longer in edit mode.

InstanceProperties.Name: selectable
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select the content of the text field.

InstanceProperties.Name: editable
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the user can edit the value in the text field.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsEditingTextAttributes
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the user can change font attributes of the text field’s string.

InstanceProperties.Name: importsGraphics
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the user can drag image files into the text field.

InstanceProperties.Name: placeholderString
InstanceProperties.Description: The string the text field displays when empty to help the user understand the text field’s purpose.

InstanceProperties.Name: placeholderAttributedString
InstanceProperties.Description: The attributed string the text field displays when empty to help the user understand the text field’s purpose.

InstanceProperties.Name: lineBreakStrategy
InstanceProperties.Description: The strategy that the system uses to break lines when laying out multiple lines of text.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsDefaultTighteningForTruncation
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether single-line text fields tighten intercharacter spacing before truncating the text.

InstanceProperties.Name: maximumNumberOfLines
InstanceProperties.Description: The maximum number of lines a wrapping text field displays before clipping or truncating the text.

InstanceProperties.Name: preferredMaxLayoutWidth
InstanceProperties.Description: The maximum width of the text field’s intrinsic content size.

InstanceProperties.Name: textColor
InstanceProperties.Description: The color of the text field’s content.

InstanceProperties.Name: backgroundColor
InstanceProperties.Description: The color of the background the text field’s cell draws behind the text.

InstanceProperties.Name: drawsBackground
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text field’s cell draws a background color behind the text.

InstanceProperties.Name: bezeled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text field draws a bezeled background around its contents.

InstanceProperties.Name: bezelStyle
InstanceProperties.Description: The text field’s bezel style, square or rounded.

InstanceProperties.Name: bordered
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the text field draws a solid black border around its contents.

InstanceProperties.Name: acceptsFirstResponder
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text field is editable and accepts first responder status.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsCharacterPickerTouchBarItem
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that controls whether the Touch Bar displays the character picker item for rich text fields.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticTextCompletionEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text field automatically completes text as the user types.

InstanceProperties.Name: delegate
InstanceProperties.Description: The text field’s delegate.

TypeMethods.Name: labelWithAttributedString:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates a text field for use as a static label that displays styled text, doesn’t wrap, and doesn’t have selectable text.

TypeMethods.Name: labelWithString:
TypeMethods.Description: Initializes a text field for use as a static label that uses the system default font, doesn’t wrap, and doesn’t have selectable text.

TypeMethods.Name: textFieldWithString:
TypeMethods.Description: Initializes a single-line editable text field for user input using the system default font and standard visual appearance.

TypeMethods.Name: wrappingLabelWithString:
TypeMethods.Description: Initializes a text field for use as a multiline static label with selectable text that uses the system default font.
